story: Today I had the bitterest experience of my life. I never had such an awful experience in my life before. I had gone to Agra for an urgent work. There were very few buses plying today as most of them had been put on election duty. I waited for two hours at the bus-stop to get into the bus. It was much crowded. I somehow managed to get some space for myself. It was really difficult to breathe. Everyone was sweating. People were pushing each other. After journey of two hours, I came out of the bus and took a sigh of relief. Use apostrophes correctly. ...Know where to place quotation marks. ...Know how to punctuate with parentheses. ...Use a hyphen for compound adjectives. ...Distinguish between the colon and the semicolon. ...Avoid multiple punctuation at the end of a sentence
